targets.target:
#!/bin/bash -xe
WORKER_IP=$(ss-get hostname) MASTER_IP=$(ss-get master_ip) MASTER_SSH_KEY_B64=$(ss-get --timeout 600 master_ssh_key_rsa_b64) export MUNGE_KEY_B64=$(ss-get --timeout 600 master_munge_key_b64) export MASTER_HOSTNAME=$(ss-get master_hostname)
ss-display 'Creating normal user' adduser --quiet --disabled-password --gecos '' tuser
ss-display 'Importing the munge key from the server' echo "$MUNGE_KEY_B64" | base64 -d > /etc/munge/munge.key chown munge:munge /etc/munge/munge.key chmod 0400 /etc/munge/munge.key
ss-display 'Starting munge' echo 'OPTIONS="--syslog"' >> /etc/default/munge service munge start
ss-display 'Configuring the worker' echo "$WORKER_IP $(hostname)" >> /etc/hosts echo "$MASTER_IP ${MASTER_HOSTNAME}" >> /etc/hosts echo '$pbsserver ' $MASTER_HOSTNAME > /var/spool/torque/mom_priv/config
ss-display 'Starting the worker' service torque-mom restart
ss-display 'Configuring SSH' su - tuser -c 'mkdir -p /home/tuser/.ssh' echo "$MASTER_SSH_KEY_B64" | base64 -d >> /home/tuser/.ssh/id_rsa chown tuser:tuser /home/tuser/.ssh/id_rsa chmod 0400 /home/tuser/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan $MASTER_IP >> /home/tuser/.ssh/known_hosts ssh-keyscan $MASTER_HOSTNAME >> /home/tuser/.ssh/known_hosts
ss-display 'Ready'

parameter.description: Munge key of the torque-master base64 encoded
parameter.name: master_munge_key_b64

parameter.description: SSH Key (RSA) of the torque-master base64 encoded
parameter.name: master_ssh_key_rsa_b64
